001
002package com.commercetools.compat;
003
004import java.net.URI;
005import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
006import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
007import java.util.concurrent.CompletionException;
008import java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage;
009
010import com.commercetools.api.client.ProjectApiRoot;
011import com.commercetools.api.defaultconfig.ApiRootBuilder;
012import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode;
013import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper;
014
015import io.sphere.sdk.client.*;
016import io.sphere.sdk.http.HttpHeaders;
017import io.sphere.sdk.http.HttpRequest;
018import io.sphere.sdk.http.HttpResponse;
019import io.sphere.sdk.json.JsonException;
020import io.sphere.sdk.json.SphereJsonUtils;
021import io.sphere.sdk.models.SphereException;
022import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.*;
023import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.oauth2.ClientCredentials;
024
025public class CompatSphereClient extends AutoCloseableService implements SphereClient {
026    private final ApiHttpClient client;
027
028    private final String projectKey;
029
030    private final ObjectMapper mapper;
031
032    private final ExceptionMode exceptionMode;
033
034    private CompatSphereClient(final ApiHttpClient apiHttpClient, final ObjectMapper mapper, final String projectKey,
035            final ExceptionMode exceptionMode) {
036        this.projectKey = projectKey;
037        this.mapper = mapper;
038        this.client = new CompatApiHttpClient(apiHttpClient, mapper);
039        this.exceptionMode = exceptionMode;
040    }
041
042    public ProjectApiRoot apiRoot() {
043        return ProjectApiRoot.fromClient(projectKey, client);
044    }
045
046    public ApiHttpClient getClient() {
047        return client;
048    }
049
050    public String getProjectKey() {
051        return projectKey;
052    }
053
054    public ExceptionMode getExceptionMode() {
055        return exceptionMode;
056    }
057
058    public ObjectMapper getMapper() {
059        return mapper;
060    }
061
062    /**
063     * creates an instance of the CompatSphereClient. Please be aware for backwards compatibility the v2 Exceptions are thrown
064     * @param clientConfig client configuration
065     * @return SphereClient using a SDK v2 ApiHttpClient as HTTP client
066     */
067    public static CompatSphereClient of(SphereClientConfig clientConfig) {
068        return of(createDefaultClient(clientConfig), SphereJsonUtils.newObjectMapper(), clientConfig.getProjectKey(),
069            ExceptionMode.SDK_V2);
070    }
071
072    /**
073     * Wraps an ApiHttpClient in a SDK v1 compatible SphereClient. SDKv1 Exceptions are thrown
074     * @param apiRoot the ApiRoot with the underlying ApiHttpClient to be used
075     * @return SphereClient using a SDK v2 ApiHttpClient as HTTP client
076     */
077    public static CompatSphereClient of(final ProjectApiRoot apiRoot) {
078        return of(apiRoot.getApiHttpClient(), SphereJsonUtils.newObjectMapper(), apiRoot.getProjectKey(),
079            ExceptionMode.SDK_V1);
080    }
081
082    /**
083     * Wraps an ApiHttpClient in a SDK v1 compatible SphereClient. SDKv1 Exceptions are thrown
084     * @param apiRoot the ApiRoot with the underlying ApiHttpClient to be used
085     * @param mapper Jackson ObjectMapper to be used for deserialization
086     * @return SphereClient using a SDK v2 ApiHttpClient as HTTP client
087     */
088    public static CompatSphereClient of(final ProjectApiRoot apiRoot, final ObjectMapper mapper) {
089        return of(apiRoot.getApiHttpClient(), mapper, apiRoot.getProjectKey(), ExceptionMode.SDK_V1);
090    }
091
092    /**
093     * Wraps an ApiHttpClient in a SDK v1 compatible SphereClient. SDKv1 Exceptions are thrown
094     * @param apiHttpClient the underlying ApiHttpClient to be used
095     * @param projectKey the key of the used project
096     * @return SphereClient using a SDK v2 ApiHttpClient as HTTP client
097     */
098    public static CompatSphereClient of(final ApiHttpClient apiHttpClient, final String projectKey) {
099        return of(apiHttpClient, SphereJsonUtils.newObjectMapper(), projectKey, ExceptionMode.SDK_V1);
100    }
101
102    /**
103     * Wraps an ApiHttpClient in a SDK v1 compatible SphereClient. SDKv1 Exceptions are thrown
104     * @param apiHttpClient the underlying ApiHttpClient to be used
105     * @param projectKey the project key to be used
106     * @param mapper Jackson ObjectMapper to be used for deserialization
107     * @return SphereClient using a SDK v2 ApiHttpClient as HTTP client
108     */
109    public static CompatSphereClient of(final ApiHttpClient apiHttpClient, final ObjectMapper mapper,
110            final String projectKey) {
111        return of(apiHttpClient, mapper, projectKey, ExceptionMode.SDK_V1);
112    }
113
114    /**
115     * Wraps an ApiHttpClient in a SDK v1 compatible SphereClient. SDKv1 Exceptions are thrown
116     * @param clientConfig client configuration
117     * @param exceptionMode SDKv1 or SDKv2 exceptions to be used
118     * @return SphereClient using a SDK v2 ApiHttpClient as HTTP client
119     */
120    public static CompatSphereClient of(SphereClientConfig clientConfig, final ExceptionMode exceptionMode) {
121        return of(createDefaultClient(clientConfig), SphereJsonUtils.newObjectMapper(), clientConfig.getProjectKey(),
122            exceptionMode);
123    }
124
125    /**
126     * Wraps an ApiHttpClient in a SDK v1 compatible SphereClient. SDKv1 Exceptions are thrown
127     * @param apiRoot the ApiRoot with the underlying ApiHttpClient to be used
128     * @param exceptionMode SDKv1 or SDKv2 exceptions to be used
129     * @return SphereClient using a SDK v2 ApiHttpClient as HTTP client
130     */
131    public static CompatSphereClient of(final ProjectApiRoot apiRoot, final ExceptionMode exceptionMode) {
132        return of(apiRoot.getApiHttpClient(), SphereJsonUtils.newObjectMapper(), apiRoot.getProjectKey(),
133            exceptionMode);
134    }
135
136    /**
137     * Wraps an ApiHttpClient in a SDK v1 compatible SphereClient. SDKv1 Exceptions are thrown
138     * @param apiRoot the ApiRoot with the underlying ApiHttpClient to be used
139     * @param mapper Jackson ObjectMapper to be used for deserialization
140     * @param exceptionMode SDKv1 or SDKv2 exceptions to be used
141     * @return SphereClient using a SDK v2 ApiHttpClient as HTTP client
142     */
143    public static CompatSphereClient of(final ProjectApiRoot apiRoot, final ObjectMapper mapper,
144            final ExceptionMode exceptionMode) {
145        return of(apiRoot.getApiHttpClient(), mapper, apiRoot.getProjectKey(), exceptionMode);
146    }
147
148    /**
149     * Wraps an ApiHttpClient in a SDK v1 compatible SphereClient. SDKv1 Exceptions are thrown
150     * @param apiHttpClient the underlying ApiHttpClient to be used
151     * @param projectKey project key to be used
152     * @param exceptionMode SDKv1 or SDKv2 exceptions to be used
153     * @return SphereClient using a SDK v2 ApiHttpClient as HTTP client
154     */
155    public static CompatSphereClient of(final ApiHttpClient apiHttpClient, final String projectKey,
156            final ExceptionMode exceptionMode) {
157        return of(apiHttpClient, SphereJsonUtils.newObjectMapper(), projectKey, exceptionMode);
158    }
159
160    /**
161     * Wraps an ApiHttpClient in a SDK v1 compatible SphereClient. SDKv1 Exceptions are thrown
162     * @param apiHttpClient the underlying ApiHttpClient to be used
163     * @param projectKey the project key to be used
164     * @param mapper Jackson ObjectMapper to be used for deserialization
165     * @param exceptionMode SDKv1 or SDKv2 exceptions to be used
166     * @return SphereClient using a SDK v2 ApiHttpClient as HTTP client
167     */
168    public static CompatSphereClient of(final ApiHttpClient apiHttpClient, final ObjectMapper mapper,
169            final String projectKey, final ExceptionMode exceptionMode) {
170        return new CompatSphereClient(apiHttpClient, mapper, projectKey, exceptionMode);
171    }
172
173    private static ApiHttpClient createDefaultClient(SphereClientConfig clientConfig) {
174        final URI resolve = URI.create(clientConfig.getApiUrl()).resolve("/" + clientConfig.getProjectKey() + "/");
175        return ApiRootBuilder.of()
176                .defaultClient(resolve)
177                .addCorrelationIdProvider(() -> clientConfig.getCorrelationIdGenerator().get())
178                .withClientCredentialsFlow(ClientCredentials.of()
179                        .withClientId(clientConfig.getClientId())
180                        .withClientSecret(clientConfig.getClientSecret())
181                        .build(),
182                    URI.create(clientConfig.getAuthUrl()).resolve("/oauth/token"))
183                .buildClient();
184    }
185
186    @Override
187    public <T> CompletionStage<T> execute(SphereRequest<T> sphereRequest) {
188        final CompatRequest<JsonNode> compatRequest = CompatRequest.of(client, projectKey, sphereRequest,
189            JsonNode.class);
190        final HttpRequest httpRequest = sphereRequest.httpRequestIntent().toHttpRequest(client.getBaseUri().toString());
191
192        if (exceptionMode == ExceptionMode.SDK_V2) {
193            return compatRequest.send()
194                    .thenApply(response -> HttpResponse.of(response.getStatusCode(), response.getBody(), httpRequest,
195                        HttpHeaders.ofMapEntryList(response.getHeaders().getHeaders())))
196                    .thenApplyAsync(sphereRequest::deserialize);
197        }
198        final CompletableFuture<T> result = new CompletableFuture<>();
199        compatRequest.send()
200                .thenApply(response -> HttpResponse.of(response.getStatusCode(), response.getBody(), httpRequest,
201                    HttpHeaders.ofMapEntryList(response.getHeaders().getHeaders())))
202                .whenComplete((httpResponse, throwable) -> {
203                    if (throwable != null) {
204                        Throwable cause = throwable instanceof CompletionException ? throwable.getCause() : throwable;
205                        if (cause instanceof ApiHttpException) {
206                            ApiHttpResponse<byte[]> errorResponse = ((ApiHttpException) cause).getResponse();
207                            if (errorResponse != null) {
208                                HttpResponse httpErrorResponse = HttpResponse.of(errorResponse.getStatusCode(),
209                                    errorResponse.getBody(), httpRequest,
210                                    HttpHeaders.ofMapEntryList(errorResponse.getHeaders().getHeaders()));
211                                Throwable e = createExceptionFor(httpErrorResponse, sphereRequest, mapper, projectKey,
212                                    httpRequest);
213                                result.completeExceptionally(e);
214                            }
215                            else {
216                                result.completeExceptionally(cause);
217                            }
218                        }
219                    }
220                    try {
221                        result.complete(sphereRequest.deserialize(httpResponse));
222                    }
223                    catch (final JsonException e) {
224                        final byte[] bytes = httpResponse.getResponseBody();
225                        e.addNote("Cannot parse " + bytesToString(bytes));
226                        result.completeExceptionally(e);
227                    }
228                });
229        return result;
230    }
231
232    public enum ExceptionMode {
233        SDK_V1, SDK_V2
234    }
235
236    private static <T> SphereException createExceptionFor(final HttpResponse httpResponse,
237            final SphereRequest<T> sphereRequest, final ObjectMapper objectMapper, final String projectKey,
238            final HttpRequest httpRequest) {
239        final SphereException sphereException = CompatExceptionFactory.of()
240                .createException(httpResponse, sphereRequest, objectMapper);
241        fillExceptionWithData(sphereRequest, httpResponse, sphereException, projectKey, httpRequest);
242        return sphereException;
243    }
244
245    private static <T> void fillExceptionWithData(final SphereRequest<T> sphereRequest, final HttpResponse httpResponse,
246            final SphereException exception, final String projectKey, final HttpRequest httpRequest) {
247        exception.setSphereRequest(sphereRequest);
248        exception.setUnderlyingHttpResponse(httpResponse);
249        exception.setProjectKey(projectKey);
250        exception.setHttpRequest(httpRequest);
251    }
252
253    private static String bytesToString(final byte[] b) {
254        return new String(b, StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
255    }
256
257    @Override
258    protected void internalClose() {
259        closeQuietly(client);
260    }
261
262    @Override
263    public SphereApiConfig getConfig() {
264        return new SphereApiConfig() {
265            @Override
266            public String getApiUrl() {
267                return client.getBaseUri().toString();
268            }
269
270            @Override
271            public String getProjectKey() {
272                return projectKey;
273            }
274
275            @Override
276            public CorrelationIdGenerator getCorrelationIdGenerator() {
277                return null;
278            }
279        };
280    }
281
282    public static class CompatApiHttpClient extends AutoCloseableService implements ApiHttpClient {
283        private final ApiHttpClient apiHttpClient;
284        private final ResponseSerializer serializer;
285
286        public CompatApiHttpClient(ApiHttpClient apiHttpClient, ObjectMapper mapper) {
287            this.apiHttpClient = apiHttpClient;
288            this.serializer = ResponseSerializer.of(mapper);
289        }
290
291        @Override
292        public URI getBaseUri() {
293            return apiHttpClient.getBaseUri();
294        }
295
296        @Override
297        public ResponseSerializer getSerializerService() {
298            return serializer;
299        }
300
301        @Override
302        public CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<byte[]>> execute(ApiHttpRequest request) {
303            return apiHttpClient.execute(request);
304        }
305
306        @Override
307        protected void internalClose() {
308            closeQuietly(apiHttpClient);
309        }
310    }
311}
